resources.string: Camera permission is needed to show the camera preview and capture image
Access to external storage is denied. Please enable storage permission
External storage permission is needed to access your pictures to upload as profile picture
You need to grant access to account manger , we use this to help auto suggest Email accounts
Call permission is needed to initiate a phone call without going through the dialer user interface for you to confirm the call
Permission Denied. Call permission is needed to initiate a phone call
You need to grant access to Read SMS for auto reading OTP
Location permission is needed to get your store information and its location.
Permission Denied. Location permission is needed to setup the store.
Read contacts permission is needed to get your contacts.
Write contacts permission is needed to get your contacts.
